item.title: 中国经济复苏迹象明显，铜价扩大涨幅
item.description: 铜连续第三天上涨，原因是中国经济数据向好，而且人们希望中国政府将推出更多经济支持措施。【原文：Copper rose for a third day on positive Chinese economic data and hopes Beijing will unveil more economic support measures.】

item.title: 消费者削减开支，东南亚数字经济放缓
item.description: 一组研究人员表示，东南亚互联网经济今年的增长速度将创下历史最慢纪录，这凸显了消费需求的疲软，以及推动显示利润而非收入增长的趋势。【原文：Southeast Asia’s internet economy will log its slowest growth on record this year, a group of researchers said, underscoring weakness in consumer demand and a push to show profits instead of revenue gains.】

item.title: 排放新规迫在眉睫，上海推出绿色航运计划
item.description: 上海政府希望将世界上最繁忙的港口改造成绿色航运中心。【原文：The government in Shanghai wants to convert the world’s busiest port into a center for greener shipping.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选可能会促进印度这三个行业的发展
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 暂停三年后中国将在境外发行美元债券
item.description: 继 9 月份出售欧元债券之后，中国计划自 2021 年以来首次出售美元债券。【原文：China is planning a dollar bond sale for the first time since 2021, following its euro-denominated debt sale in September.】

item.title: 印度柴油市场增长放缓，发出警告信号
item.description: 随着需求增长速度放缓，印度的柴油市场正在失去动力，给这个世界第三大石油进口国蒙上了一层阴影，即使经济在继续扩张。【原文：The diesel market in India is losing momentum as the pace of demand growth slows, casting a pall over the world’s third-largest oil importer even as the economy continues to expand.】

item.title: ADM 将修正业绩，因更多会计错误取消电话会议
item.description: 阿彻-丹尼尔斯-米德兰公司（Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. said it will amend previous financial statements after finding additional accounting issues, prompting the crop trader to cancel its quarterly earnings call with analysts 14 hours before its start.】

item.title: 派拉蒙主席莎莉-雷德斯通将在 Skydance 合并后离开董事会
item.description: 据熟悉 Shari Redstone 计划的人士透露，在派拉蒙全球公司完成与 Skydance Media 的合并计划后，她将不会继续留在派拉蒙董事会。【原文：Shari Redstone won’t stay on the board of Paramount Global after the company completes its planned merger with Skydance Media, according to people familiar with her plans.】

item.title: 中国经济有望刺激股市，数据令人鼓舞
item.description: 中国股市上涨，原因是交易商评估了将地方政府的部分表外债务转入其官方账户的建议所产生的影响，而且一项服务业活动指标超出了经济学家的预测。【原文：Chinese stocks gained as traders assessed the impact of a proposal to transfer some off-balance-sheet debt of local governments to their official accounts and a gauge of service activity beat economists’ forecasts.】

item.title: 刺激政策后中国服务业增长超预期
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国的服务业活动以 7 月份以来最快的速度增长，这表明在中国政府最近采取一系列刺激措施支撑经济增长之后，消费需求可能正在复苏。【原文：China’s service activity expanded at the fastest pace since July, a private survey showed, a sign that consumer demand may be on the mend after Beijing’s recent barrage of stimulus measures to shore up growth.】

item.title: 小额贷款违约可能给印度经济带来风险
item.description: 在印度，由于激进的借贷行为导致零售贷款违约率上升，这在股市上引起了反响，分析师担心可能会波及更广泛的经济领域。【原文：A rise in retail-loan defaults in India due to aggressive lending practices is reverberating in the stock market, with analysts worrying about possible spillover into the broader economy.】

item.title: CoreWeave 选择摩根士丹利、高盛和摩根大通进行 2025 年首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能领域最炙手可热的初创公司之一、云计算供应商 CoreWeave 已选择摩根士丹利、高盛集团和摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：CoreWeave, a cloud-computing provider that’s one of the hottest startups in artificial intelligence, has selected Morgan Stanley, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. to lead its planned initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果提供额外印尼投资以取消 iPhone 禁令
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司已提议投资近 1000 万美元在印尼生产更多的产品，因为该公司希望取消印尼对其最新款 iPhone 的销售禁令。【原文：Apple Inc. has proposed investing almost $10 million to make additional goods in Indonesia, according to people familiar with the matter, as it seeks to have the country’s ban on sales of its latest iPhone removed.】

item.title: 日元是众多日本资产中首个因美国大选而转向的资产
item.description: 如果卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）在美国总统大选中获胜，就有可能支持日本疲软的货币，而如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）获胜，则可能会提振东京股市，并使日元面临更大幅度下滑的风险。【原文：A victory for Kamala Harris in the US presidential election has the potential to support Japan’s ailing currency while a win for Donald Trump would probably boost the Tokyo stock market and put the yen at risk of a deeper slump.】

item.title: 据说是雪花公司客户信息泄露事件幕后黑手被捕
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大当局已经逮捕了一名男子，他被怀疑是一连串黑客攻击事件的幕后黑手，涉及多达 165 名 Snowflake Inc.【原文：Canadian authorities have arrested a man suspected of being behind a string of hacks involving as many as 165 customers of Snowflake Inc., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股票快速上涨带来的意外之财掩盖了中国的盈利阴霾
item.description: 中国第三季度的收入恢复了增长，但仔细观察这些数字，就会发现情况并不那么令人鼓舞。【原文：Chinese earnings returned to growth in the third quarter but a closer look at the numbers reveals a picture that’s far less encouraging.】

item.title: 监管机构拒绝后，亚马逊仍支持塔伦核电交易
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）表示，在美国最高能源监管机构拒绝了为宾夕法尼亚州一座核电厂供电的特别协议后，该公司将致力于在该核电厂附近建设一个数据中心园区。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. said it’s committed to building a data center campus adjacent to a Pennsylvania nuclear plant after the top US energy regulator rejected a special deal to power the facility.】

item.title: 美国大选在即，市场屏住呼吸，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 在市场为紧张的美国大选和本周晚些时候的美联储利率决议做准备之际，黄金持稳。【原文：Gold was steady as the market braced for a tight US election, and a Federal Reserve rate decision later in the week.】

item.title: 日本股市走高，交易员结束三天周末返程
item.description: 日本股市攀升，从上周五的跌势中反弹，市场从为期三天的周末中重新开市。美国总统大选的紧张局势使交易商保持警惕，而东京股市开始增加 30 分钟的交易时间可能会在收盘时加剧波动。【原文：Japanese stocks climbed, rebounding from Friday’s drop, as markets reopened from a three-day weekend. A tight US presidential election kept traders on guard, while the start of an additional 30 minutes of trading in Tokyo may increase volatility toward the close.】

item.title: 中东局势紧张，美国大选成焦点，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 周一，中东紧张局势加剧，欧佩克+决定推迟向市场恢复石油供应量，导致石油价格跳涨近3%，随后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after jumping almost 3% on Monday on heightened tensions in the Middle East and OPEC+’s decision to delay restoring barrels to the market.】

item.title: 苹果公司通过 "Atlas "用户研究探索进军智能眼镜领域的途径
item.description: 苹果公司正在对目前市场上的产品进行内部研究，探索进军智能眼镜领域，为该公司跟随 Meta Platforms 公司进入这一日益流行的领域创造条件。【原文：Apple Inc. is exploring a push into smart glasses with an internal study of products currently on the market, setting the stage for the company to follow Meta Platforms Inc. into an increasingly popular category.】

item.title: 市场增加 30 分钟交易时间，日本股市或将上涨
item.description: 日本股市可能会上涨，因为投资者结束了为期三天的周末，并在东京多了 30 分钟的交易时间。【原文：Japanese stocks will likely rise as investors return from a three-day weekend and get an additional 30 minutes of trading in Tokyo.】

item.title: 创纪录的外资撤离给印度股市蒙上阴影
item.description: 有迹象表明，南亚国家大流行病后的经济繁荣正在失去动力，外国投资者正在对印度股市产生反感，抛售了创纪录数量的股票。【原文：Foreign investors are souring on India’s stock market, selling a record amount of shares amid signs the South Asian nation’s post-pandemic economic boom is losing steam.】

item.title: OpenAI 正在与加州商谈成为营利性公司事宜
item.description: 通过与监管机构进行初步讨论，OpenAI 正在推进其将价值 1,570 亿美元的公司的非营利性结构转变为营利性业务的努力。【原文：OpenAI is advancing in its bid to transform the non-profit structure of the $157 billion company into a for-profit business by having preliminary discussions with regulators.】

item.title: 大选箭在弦上，亚洲股市保持谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 随着美国总统大选和美联储利率决议时间的临近，风险厌恶情绪不断升温，亚洲股市当天涨跌不一。【原文：Asian equities were set for a mixed day amid increasing risk-off sentiment, as the clock ticked down to a tight US presidential election and the Federal Reserve rate decision.】

item.title: 白金级公关软件公司 Cision 成立新法人实体
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，铂金股权公司（Platinum Equity）支持的 Cision Ltd. 向一些贷款机构披露，该公司于 11 月 1 日成立了一家新的控股公司，一些贷款机构认为此举是资产出售或抵押品转让前的第一步。【原文：Platinum Equity-backed Cision Ltd. disclosed to some lenders that it created a new holding company on Nov. 1, a move some lenders are considering as the first step before an asset sale or collateral transfer, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 汽车业低迷影响预测，恩智浦暴跌
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）受汽车行业增长放缓的影响，对第四季度的销售和盈利作出了令人失望的预测，在尾盘交易中下跌。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV fell in late trading after giving a disappointing forecast for fourth-quarter sales and earnings, hurt by a slowdown in the automotive industry.】

item.title: Palantir 公布创纪录利润，称人工智能需求 "坚定不移
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. 公布的季度收入超过了分析师的预期，并上调了对当期营业收入的预期，理由是美国对其人工智能软件的需求很高。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. reported quarterly revenue that beat analysts’ estimates and raised its forecast for operating income in the current period, citing high demand in the US for its artificial intelligence software.】

item.title: TGI Friday 寻找买家，面临与债券销售相关的障碍
item.description: TGI Friday's Inc.的一位律师周一表示，该公司正在与潜在买家洽谈，并透露，由于失去了用于担保 2017 年出售的 3.75 亿美元债券的资产控制权，该公司的收入受到了 "重大 "打击。【原文：TGI Friday’s Inc. is speaking with potential buyers, a company attorney said Monday, and disclosed it suffered a “significant” revenue hit when it lost control of assets it used to secure $375 million in bonds it sold in 2017.】

item.title: 马斯克削减 2 万亿美元预算会让这些股票大涨
item.description: 还有一天就是美国总统大选了，华尔街的战略家们正在为前总统唐纳德-特朗普或副总统卡马拉-哈里斯获胜所带来的经济影响做准备，从税收、关税到移民。【原文：With the US presidential election a day away, Wall Street strategists are preparing for the economic ramifications of former President Donald Trump or Vice President Kamala Harris winning, from taxes to tariffs to immigration.】
